com.qozix.layouts

Class AnchorLayout.LayoutParams

  • java.lang.Object
    • ViewGroup.LayoutParams
      • com.qozix.layouts.AnchorLayout.LayoutParams
  • Enclosing class:
    AnchorLayout

    public static class AnchorLayout.LayoutParams
extends ViewGroup.LayoutParams
    Per-child layout information associated with AnchorLayout.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.Float anchorX
      Float value to determine the child's horizontal offset.
      java.lang.Float anchorY
      Float value to determine the child's vertical offset.
      int x
      The absolute left position of the child in pixels
      int y
      The absolute right position of the child in pixels

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AnchorLayout.LayoutParams(int width, int height)
      Creates a new set of layout parameters with the specified values.

      Creates a new set of layout parameters with the specified values.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • x

        public int x
        The absolute left position of the child in pixels

      • y

        public int y
        The absolute right position of the child in pixels

      • anchorX

        public java.lang.Float anchorX
        Float value to determine the child's horizontal offset. This float is multiplied by the child's width. If null, the containing AnchorLayout's anchor values will be used.

      • anchorY

        public java.lang.Float anchorY
        Float value to determine the child's vertical offset. This float is multiplied by the child's height. If null, the containing AnchorLayout's anchor values will be used.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AnchorLayout.LayoutParams

        public AnchorLayout.LayoutParams(ViewGroup.LayoutParams source)
        Copy constructor
        Parameters:
        source - (LayoutParams) LayoutParams instance to copy properties from

      • AnchorLayout.LayoutParams

        public AnchorLayout.LayoutParams(int width,
                         int height)
        Creates a new set of layout parameters with the specified values.
        Parameters:
        width - (int) Information about how wide the view wants to be. This should generally be WRAP_CONTENT or a fixed value.
        height - (int) Information about how tall the view wants to be. This should generally be WRAP_CONTENT or a fixed value.

      • AnchorLayout.LayoutParams

        public AnchorLayout.LayoutParams(int width,
                         int height,
                         int left,
                         int top)
        Creates a new set of layout parameters with the specified values.
        Parameters:
        width - (int) Information about how wide the view wants to be. This should generally be WRAP_CONTENT or a fixed value.
        height - (int) Information about how tall the view wants to be. This should generally be WRAP_CONTENT or a fixed value.
        left - (int) Sets the absolute x value of the view's position in pixels
        top - (int) Sets the absolute y value of the view's position in pixels

      • AnchorLayout.LayoutParams

        public AnchorLayout.LayoutParams(int width,
                         int height,
                         int left,
                         int top,
                         float aX,
                         float aY)
        Creates a new set of layout parameters with the specified values.
        Parameters:
        width - (int) Information about how wide the view wants to be. This should generally be WRAP_CONTENT or a fixed value.
        height - (int) Information about how tall the view wants to be. This should generally be WRAP_CONTENT or a fixed value.
        left - (int) Sets the absolute x value of the view's position in pixels
        top - (int) Sets the absolute y value of the view's position in pixels
        aX - (float) Sets the relative horizontal offset of the view (multiplied by the view's width)
        aY - (float) Sets the relative vertical offset of the view (multiplied by the view's height)
